text: David Azulai (5 May 1954 â€“ 30 October 2018) was an Israeli politician. He as a member of the Knesset for Shas for over 20 years from 1996 until his resignation in May 2018. He was also Minister of Religious Services from 2015 until his death in 2018. He was born in Meknes, Morocco. Azulai died on 30 October 2018 in Tel Aviv from cancer at the age of 64.David Azoulay, Israel's Religious Services Minister, Dies at 64 Haaretz, 30 October 2018 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Israel Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Moroccan Jews Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Shas politicians Category:Moroccan politicians
title: David Azulai
